title: Effectiveness of potential strategies to mitigate surface urban heat island: A comprehensive investigation using high-resolution thermal observations from an unmanned aerial vehicle
content:

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 113

Author(s): Sitao Li, Yi Zhu, Haokai Wan, Qiankun Xiao, Mingjun Teng, Wen Xu, Xiaogao Qiu, Xuefei Wu, Changguang Wu
